text: Lhotse is the fourth tallest mountain of the world. It's height is above sea level. The summit of this mountain is in the border of Tibet and Nepal.Details about Lothse Flight Kathmandu-Himalayas-18-Nuptse-Everest-Lhotse-2014-gje.jpg Kala Patthar-48-Gipfel-Everest-Lhotse-2007-gje.jpg Gorak Shep-32-Everest- Lhotse-2007-gje.jpg Lobuche to Gorak Shep-86-Anstieg-Lhotse-2007-gje.jpg Namche to Dhole-04-Choerte-Everest-Nuptse-Lhotse-2007-gje.jpg Tengboche-Namche Bazaar-80-Everest-Lhotse-2007-gje.jpg ==References== Category:Mountains of Nepal Category:Mountains of Tibet Category:Himalayas
